# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the node is casting light.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

```swift
var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the light is enabled and affects sprite nodes in the scene. The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Determining Whether a Light Node Is Active

- **categoryBitMask**: A mask that defines which categories this light belongs to.
